description:
comparing gain- and loss-framed ads for the purposes of an Internet-based smoking cessation intervention.

Free Online Program for helping smokers to quit.

Live without tobacco is a free program for those who want to quit smoking. It was developed by specialists inn tobacco treatments using scientific evidences.

Information, quizzes and quit plan to help you quit smoking.

The intervention was developed with the active participation of former and current smokers.
